microsoft.name: Microsoft Account
microsoft.message: Official. After pressing OK, please operate in the pop-up browser window. The code to be entered is on the clipboard.

minecraft_universal_login.name: Minecraft Universal Login Account
minecraft_universal_login.message: Some servers are required to help the server owner verify the identity of the player.

authlib_injector.name: Authlib Injector
authlib_injector.message: Some servers are required to be used to help the server owner verify the identity of the player, and can also set skin and friends online for piracy.

offline.name: Offline Account
offline.message: The choice of pirated players. Skin cannot be set.
